title: Rebirth of the World Traveller - Novel Updates
author: My Smoke   我抽的烟
description:
Chen Wu Sheng’s monologue:

In the dark of night.

I quietly watched my rotting corpse.

I had thought this unbearable life had already come to an end.

But a space-time gate opened before my soul.

And I was sent to retrieve my 15-year-old body.

Thus, I began crossing between countless worlds.

Seeking that excitement I had never experienced before.>
